portfolio.title: Apna Shop
portfolio.description: It is a web application to facilitate e-commerce for clothing. As well as having a user dashboard,it also includes an ADMIN dashboard.

portfolio.title: Gamerspoint
portfolio.description: It's an e-commerce web application for computer accessories and gaming equipment. It also features an ADMIN dashboard.It was developed using c#.net(core).

portfolio.title: ZoomClone
portfolio.description: A single app that combines team meetings with live chat from anywhere. It was developed using node.js,HTML and CSS
